SEARCH
Package scs1_group1.container.user

Class StaffContainer

Object
UserContainer
StaffContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Container
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdministratorContainer, DoctorContainer, PharmacistContainer
public class StaffContainer extends UserContainer
Container class for managing Staff records, including Doctors, Pharmacists, and Administrators. Provides functionalities to load, retrieve, add, and export Staff data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StaffContainer(String filePath, String userType)
    Constructs a StaffContainer and loads staff from the given CSV file.

  • Constructor Details

    • StaffContainer

      public StaffContainer(String filePath, String userType)
      Constructs a StaffContainer and loads staff from the given CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to the CSV file containing staff data.
      userType - The type of user to be loaded (e.g., "Doctor", "Pharmacist", "Administrator").

  • Method Details

    • addStaff

      public void addStaff(String staffId, String password, String name, String gender, String userType, String email, int age)
      Adds a new staff member to the container.
      Parameters:
      staffId - The hospital ID of the staff.
      password - The password of the staff.
      name - The name of the staff.
      gender - The gender of the staff.
      userType - The type of user (e.g., Doctor, Pharmacist, Administrator).
      email - The email of the staff.
      age - The age of the staff.

    • initializeStaffCSV

      public void initializeStaffCSV(String filePath)
      Initializes the CSV file for staff with the appropriate header.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to the CSV file that will be initialized.

    • appendStaffToCSVByStaffType

      public void appendStaffToCSVByStaffType(String filePath, String staffType)
      Appends specific staff type records to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to the CSV file where staff data will be appended.
      staffType - The type of staff to be appended (e.g., "doctor", "pharmacist").

    • writeStaffToCSV

      private void writeStaffToCSV(FileWriter writer, Staff staff, String role) throws IOException
      Helper method to write individual staff entries to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      writer - The FileWriter to write the data to the CSV file.
      staff - The Staff object containing the staff's information.
      role - The role of the staff (e.g., Doctor, Pharmacist).
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error writing to the file.
